## HPV

* Bypass the 'plate-count anomaly' and extract genomic information directly from the sample
* A snapshot of the genetic content of microbial community
* Communities of varied phyletic composition
* High rates of horizontal gene transfer
* Large amount of genetic and metabolic diversity
